title: Small-group anatomy learning based on 3D visualization: Understanding the pterygopalatine fossa structure

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Small-group collaborative learning environment enhancing understanding of the 3D spatial structure of the palatine bone's lateral process for active medical professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain spatial relationships of the pterygopalatine fossa with 85% accuracy using 3D visualization materials
Learners can analyze three or more interactions between 3D models (images/physical models) and neurovascular structures through small-group discussions
Learners can demonstrate knowledge improvement by achieving a correct answer rate of 80% or higher (15 out of 20) on formative assessment spatial anatomy items.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
